exif.title: EXIF Mode
exif.tooltip: If enabled, only rename images with EXIF data.

creationDate.title: Use Created Date
creationDate.tooltip: When enabled, date variables use the file creation date.

helpDoc.step1Desc: Selected files will be displayed in the table.
helpDoc.step2Desc: The variables below are supported, and you can preview the resulting names in the table.
